title: Microsoft PowerPoint
summary: Microsoft PowerPoint is a presentation program,[6] created by Robert Gaskins and Dennis Austin[6] at a software company named Forethought, Inc.[6] It was released on April 20, 1987,[7] initially for Macintosh computers only.[6] Microsoft acquired PowerPoint for about $14 million three months after it appeared.[8] This was Microsoft's first significant acquisition,[9] and Microsoft set up a new business unit for PowerPoint in Silicon Valley where Forethought had been located.[9]
